title: Segway Tri-Wheel Electric Scooter (For Parts Only, No Battery, No Charger)
item_description:
Segway Tri-Wheel Electric Scooter (NEW, No Battery, No Charger)

Quantity: 1
Manufacturer: Ninebot(Changzhou) Tech. Co., Ltd
Model: T60
Power Source: Electric
Motor Power: 350W
Max Payload: 220 lbs
Max Speed: 15.5mph
Front & Rear Tire Size: 60/70-6.5
Approximate Weight: 75 lb
No charger
No battery
For part only
Unit powered by Segway
Photo Gallery Note: Representative photos were used for this lot.
